content.rendered:
Maple Ave Morning Announcements 

Thursday May 22, 2025 

Today is a “B” Day 

 

  •  Attention Football Players! There will be a Football Interest Meeting this Friday during 6th, 7th, & 8th grade flexes in the front gym. Please check in with your flex teacher for attendance, then proceed to the front gym where the high school and modified football coaches will be sharing important information about the upcoming season. Please see Coach Martucci, Coach Coons, or Coach Durant with any questions. 

 

  • Today’s lunch is orange chicken, fried rice and dumplings, steamed peas, and fresh tomatoes 

 Be Safe, Be Respectful, Be responsible and Be KIND.  

As Always, make it a great day or not… the choice is yours.
